sections.heading: Early Life
sections.content: Siddhartha Gautama was born a prince in the 5th century BCE in present-day Nepal.

sections.heading: Enlightenment
sections.content: After years of ascetic practice, he attained enlightenment under the Bodhi tree.

sections.heading: Teachings
sections.content: He taught the Middle Way and the Four Noble Truths, forming the core of Buddhism.

sections.heading: Legacy
sections.content: His followers spread Buddhism across Asia, shaping spiritual traditions.
